message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_CONFIGURATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: A case configuration must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The case type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_EVIDENCE_NATURE_MANDATORY
message.locale: An evidence nature must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_EVIDENCE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The evidence record must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_UNSUPPORTED_CASE_TYPE
message.locale: The specified case type, %1c, is not supported for this type of case evidence configuration.
